title: High-performance Database Integrating Transaction and Analysis
abstract: This paper first introduces the performance dilemma faced by OLAP database, and then combines the operational characteristics of OLTP database, innovatively adopts loosely coupled distributed architecture, designs a high-performance database integrating transaction and analysis (DITAA), analyzes its structure and data, and queries the number of scan lines and experiment to verify the performance improvement of the high-performance database integrating transaction and analysis.
venue: 2018 International Computers, Signals and Systems Conference (ICOMSSC)

journal.name: 2018 International Computers, Signals and Systems Conference (ICOMSSC)
